TEXT: An ancient warrior from an old war. NL Wields the forbidden power of the void alongside various weaponry.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~exalted~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
